name.description: A user-readable title string for the protocol handler. This will be displayed to the user in interface objects as needed.

protocol.description: The protocol the site wishes to handle, specified as a string. For example, you can register to handle SMS text message links by registering to handle the "sms" scheme.

uriTemplate.description: The URL of the handler, as a string. This string should include "%s" as a placeholder which will be replaced with the escaped URL of the document to be handled. This URL might be a true URL, or it could be a phone number, email address, or so forth.

protocol_handlers.description: A list of protocol handler definitions.

headerURL.deprecated: Unsupported images property, use 'theme.images.theme_frame', this alias is ignored in Firefox >= 70.

accentcolor.deprecated: Unsupported colors property, use 'theme.colors.frame', this alias is ignored in Firefox >= 70.

textcolor.deprecated: Unsupported color property, use 'theme.colors.tab_background_text', this alias is ignored in Firefox >= 70.

toolbar_text.description: This color property is an alias of 'bookmark_text'.

toolbar_field_separator.deprecated: This color property is ignored in Firefox >= 89.

types.description: Contents of manifest.json for a static theme

theme_icons.description: Specifies icons to use for dark and light themes

default_area.description: Defines the location the browserAction will appear by default.  The default location is navbar.

instant_url.deprecated: Unsupported on Firefox at this time.

image_url.deprecated: Unsupported on Firefox at this time.

search_url_get_params.description: GET parameters to the search_url as a query string.

search_url_post_params.description: POST parameters to the search_url as a query string.

suggest_url_get_params.description: GET parameters to the suggest_url as a query string.

suggest_url_post_params.description: POST parameters to the suggest_url as a query string.

instant_url_post_params.deprecated: Unsupported on Firefox at this time.

image_url_post_params.deprecated: Unsupported on Firefox at this time.

alternate_urls.deprecated: Unsupported on Firefox at this time.

is_default.description: Sets the default engine to a built-in engine only.

params.description: A list of optional search url parameters. This allows the additon of search url parameters based on how the search is performed in Firefox.

condition.description: The type of param can be either "purpose" or "pref".

pref.description: The preference to retrieve the value from.

purpose.description: The context that initiates a search, required if condition is "purpose".

open_at_install.description: Whether or not the sidebar is opened at install. Default is true.

types.description: Common properties for all manifest.json files

applications.description: The applications property is deprecated, please use 'browser_specific_settings'

extension_pages.description: The Content Security Policy used for extension pages.

types.description: Represents a WebExtension language pack manifest.json file
Represents a WebExtension dictionary manifest.json file
Represents a WebExtension site permissions manifest.json file

light.description: A light icon to use for dark themes

dark.description: The dark icon to use for light themes

types.description: Same as MatchPattern above, but excludes <all_urls>

Mostly unrestricted match patterns for privileged add-ons. This should technically be rejected for unprivileged add-ons, but, reasons. The MatchPattern class will still refuse privileged schemes for those extensions.

Details of the script or CSS to inject. Either the code or the file property must be set, but both may not be set at the same time. Based on InjectDetails, but using underscore rather than camel case naming conventions.

css.description: The list of CSS files to inject

js.description: The list of JS files to inject

all_frames.description: If allFrames is true, implies that the JavaScript or CSS should be injected into all frames of current page. By default, it's false and is only injected into the top frame.

match_about_blank.description: If matchAboutBlank is true, then the code is also injected in about:blank and about:srcdoc frames if your extension has access to its parent document. Code cannot be inserted in top-level about:-frames. By default it is false.

run_at.description: The soonest that the JavaScript or CSS will be injected into the tab. Defaults to "document_idle".

types.deprecated: An unexpected property was found in the WebExtension manifest.

theme_icons.description: Specifies icons to use for dark and light themes

default_area.description: Defines the location the browserAction will appear by default.  The default location is navbar.
